FullTitle: ICAgile AI for Product Metrics Micro Credential
ShortDesc: Measuring what matters is key to product success. This ICAgile micro-credential empowers you to use AI for defining, tracking, and interpreting product metrics to connect data to business outcomes.
Overview: 3 hours of focused, live expert-led training. This micro-credential offers a hands-on introduction to using AI tools to identify, track, and act on product analytics. Evaluate feature success, customer impact, and usage trends using AI to evaluation performance.
Why_This_Course: Define, track, and interpret product metrics using AI|Connect data-driven insights with business outcomes|Identify relevant product health and performance indicators|Evaluate feature success and usage trends with predictive analytics|Improve product performance continuously through data
Module_List: Uncover Meaningful Metrics|Identify health and performance indicators|Analyze Product Outcomes|Evaluate feature success and customer impact|Drive Data-Informed Action
Success_Steps: Attend Live Sessions|Active Participate in Simulations|Receive ICP-AI-METRICS Certification
PreRequisites: Basic knowledge of what AI is, agile principles, values, and mindset.
Certification_Criteria: Accredited by ICAgile. Includes ongoing assessment throughout the class and a final practical assessment to earn certification.

FullTitle: ICAgile AI for Stakeholder Management Micro Credential
ShortDesc: Unlock the power of AI to transform how you engage with stakeholders. This ICAgile micro-credential equips you with the skills to analyze stakeholder needs, predict engagement challenges, and use AI tools to foster stronger relationships.
Overview: 3 hours of interactive, live instructor-led training. Explore how AI can sharpen your approach to stakeholder management. Use AI to analyze stakeholders through sentiment analysis and influence mapping while balancing AI support with essential human interaction.
Why_This_Course: Analyze stakeholder needs and predict engagement challenges|AI-powered stakeholder mapping and influence analysis|Enhance collaboration, alignment, and decision-making|Design AI-assisted communication plans|Balance AI efficiency with essential human judgment
Module_List: Use AI to Analyze Stakeholders|Sentiment analysis and influence mapping|Persona generation for stakeholder needs|Design AI-Assisted Communication Plans|Balance AI with Human Skills
Success_Steps: Attend Live Sessions|Active Participate in Simulations|Receive ICP-AI-STAKEHOLDER Certification
PreRequisites: Basic knowledge of what AI is, agile principles, values, and mindset.
Certification_Criteria: Accredited by ICAgile. Includes ongoing assessment throughout the class and a final practical assessment to earn certification.
